thread.title: Eco Taxi Extends Their Services of Taxi, Car, Limo and Airport Shuttle from Long Island to All over New York and All the Airports.
thread.title_full: Eco Taxi Extends Their Services of Taxi, Car, Limo and Airport Shuttle from Long Island to All over New York and All the Airports.

author: prbuzz.com
title: Eco Taxi Extends Their Services of Taxi, Car, Limo and Airport Shuttle from Long Island to All over New York and All the Airports.
text:
Eco-Taxi provides a reliable reservation service system with 24-hour dispatch, tracking and trip oversight support and up-front all inclusive billing. Established in 2012, Eco-Taxi believes that solution begins with all of us, which is why they work closely with other green companies to accomplish their goals.
Eco Taxi extends their services of taxi, car, limo and airport shuttle from long Island to all over New York and all the airports. Eco Taxi has helped thousands of fellow passengers and travelers from all over the world to reach their destination always on time with style and comfort.
Eco Taxi is one of the finest car service to JFK with an extensive, luxurious and dependable fleet of vehicles at your service. Due to heavy and chocked traffic in New York, people have moved towards using professional driving services. People are often seen using driving services for going home from office, for night drives with family, to and from airport. This is because after hectic and tiring day no one wants to drive or after a rough flight people just want to reach home quickly. Realizing the people needs, Eco Taxi provides their fellow citizens the best services within an affordable range and are now spreading across the Tri-State. People are satisfied with their cars and drivers, and now recommending them to their friends and family.
“My wife is physically challenged, and was flying in and out of JFK during a very snowy period. Joe made sure that he was at the airport on time to pick her up, found her when she was having trouble with cell phone service, and then delivered her easily to her destination.
For my wife’s return, Joe notified her in advance about needing an earlier pick-up time to avoid weather delays. He kept her well-informed throughout the process and she made her flight without having to rush. He also kept me in the loop so that I could confirm everything with her. Highly recommended” – says one of their clients.
Eco-Taxi provides a reliable reservation service system with 24-hour dispatch, tracking and trip oversight support and up-front all inclusive billing. Established in 2012, Eco-Taxi believes that solution begins with all of us, which is why they work closely with other green companies to accomplish their goals. Eco-Taxi is one of the leading network of ground transportation services that are committed to improving the environmental footprint and cut costs for passengers at the same time.
